tool_description: Elevate Business Intelligence by using Alternative Data in your market and investment research analysis.
name: AltAPI
title: AltAPI

api_list.name: Financial Statement Summarization
api_list.description: This endpoint leverages GPT-3.5 engine to summarize the latest financial statements of the company entered by the user. The users can enter any US Stock Ticker Symbol along with the financial statement they would like to analyze - balance_sheet, income_statement or cashflow. Within a few seconds the endpoint will generate a quick summary for the user to give them an overview of the company's financial positioning and health.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://altapi1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-financial-statements/TSLA/cashflow/quarterly"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://altapi1.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-financial-statements/{ticker}/{financial_statement}/{frequency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Social Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides the sentiment score along with the most popular URL page for the company for the current date. It requires the user to put in the company name as the parameter.

It may happen that no results are provided, this will be because the company you've searched for either is not much talked about in the news or other social media platforms or there might not be any related news for that company on that specific date.

required_parameters.name: asset
required_parameters.description: Enter the asset name you want the sentiment analysis for:

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://altapi1.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/amazon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://altapi1.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/{asset}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ESG Scores
api_list.description:
ESG score stands for a company's Enviornmental, Social and Governance score. It is one of the most recent Alternative Data. This GET request provides a JSON response which includes :
1. Overall ESG Score
2. Governance Score
3. Environmental Score
4. Social Score
The user is provided to input a company ticker as the parameter.

required_parameters.name: US_stock_ticker
required_parameters.description: Enter the TICKER of the company:

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://altapi1.p.rapidapi.com/esg/TSLA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Google PlayStore App Reviews Analysis
api_list.description: This endpoint enables users to analyse the reviews of an app on Google PlayStore. This endpoint uses textual emotional classification to differentiate between reviews that are negative and positive and also labels them with certain positive and negative scores.
api_list.code:
import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
